detail_desc: Treggings in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Baseball jacket in viscose twill with sleeves in embossed imitation leather and embroidered appliqués on the back. Striped stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, welt side pockets, an inner pocket with a concealed press-stud, and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, discreet side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted vest top in a rib knit with a square neckline front and back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a shirt collar in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Fully lined, ribbed swimsuit with a belt at the waist, lined cups with removable inserts, high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted sparkly button at the top and long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, wide sides with a drawstring and full coverage at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in superstretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets with a flap, and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Oversized T-shirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft, gently draping jersey with elastication and a flounced trim at the top and two high slits at the front. Unlined.
Turtleneck top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Leggings in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Wide foldover ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and a metal fastener at the front.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Ties and a double flounce at the top, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a seam with a wide panel under the bust. Short puff-sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a flared skirt with a slit at the front. Lined.

Hi-tops in glittery imitation leather with elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a small loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pocket with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Waist bag in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Two-way zip at the front, one zipped outer compartment at the back and one inner compartment. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Half-lined. Size 5x17.5x31 cm.
Knee socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a decorative satin bow at the top.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Detachable tie belt at the waist.
Dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a round neck, press-studs on the shoulders and long sleeves. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.

Coat in a soft, felted wool blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Diagonal welt side pockets and long raglan sleeves with a tab and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Metal chain bracelets in various designs with a trigger clasp.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric.
Cap-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with gathered side seams for best fit.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and drawstring down the front that ties at the hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with smocking around the neckline and hem and long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Puffer jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and taped zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, an inner pocket, ribbed cuffs and concealed, covered elastication at the hem. Polyester filling.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with embroidery. Zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs with cut-off, frayed hems.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sandals in imitation suede with covered block heels, crossover foot straps and long straps that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side and pleats at the front. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in an organic cotton weave with two chest pockets, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Elastic-trimmed hood with ears at the top, two concealed zips down the front for easy changing, and long sleeves with foldover mitts to keep the hands warm. Soft fleece lining made from recycled polyester.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Fine-knit, fitted jumper in soft merino wool with a high collar.

Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, buttons at the top and short, wide sleeves. Pin-tucks at the front and shoulders, and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Metal bangles in different designs.
Slightly shorter, boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Acetate earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 4.6 cm.
Double-layered jersey hat with a reversible sequin motif.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, belt, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Comb for wool and cashmere that removes bobbles and helps to prolong the life of garments. To use, place the garment on a solid surface and comb carefully.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with a hole-knitted pattern on the front and sleeves, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.
Wide coat in a felted weave with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Blouse in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace at the top, a transparent mesh yoke and long sleeves with a seam and flared cuffs doubled with a layer of mesh.

Softshell parka in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with soft fleece inside and a detachable hood with a soft fleece lining. Stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a zipped chest pocket. Elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Ankle-length dungarees in washed denim with a concealed zip down the front and a press-stud at the top and waist. Straps with a press-stud fastening, a chest pocket, patch front pockets, back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Slim fit with narrow hems.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short, broderie anglaise sleeves.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves, a seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a boat neck at the front and V-neck with ties at the back. Gathers in the sides for best fit. Slightly longer at the front with a rounded hem.
Metal hair clip decorated with a bow made of plastic beads. Length of hair clip 6.5 cm.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Integral bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and covered elastication at the hem.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Short, fitted dress in airy, patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar and a concealed zip at the back. Draped front and a gathered seam at the back of the skirt. Long puff sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders for added volume. Jersey lining.
